EmailTemplate.description: The committee recommendation update to a project
EmailTemplate.name: Committee Recommendation update
EmailTemplate.subject: Committee recommendation for Project {!Project_Tracker__c.Project_Name__c} is {!Project_Tracker__c.Committee_Recommendation__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Project {!Project_Tracker__c.Project_Name__c }, committee recommendations is {!Project_Tracker__c.Committee_Recommendation__c}

The link to the project details :{!Project_Tracker__c.Link}
Thanks,
{!Project_Tracker__c.OwnerFullName}
